CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Polytechnic relative to Celestial College?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Polytechnic is {below} Celestial College in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Institute of Technology relative to Borealis Graduate School?
SRP.A: Zenith Institute of Technology is {below} Borealis Graduate School in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Arcane University relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Arcane University is {below} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverhaven Polytechnic}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Institute of Technology}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Graduate School's maximum Student-Teacher Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Graduate School's maximum Student-Teacher Ratio is in {1950}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Polytechnic's maximum Student-Teacher Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Polytechnic's maximum Student-Teacher Ratio is in {1969}.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1957 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1957 was {lower} than in 1969.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1958, did the total Student-Teacher Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1951 and 1953?
NC.A: The change in total student-teacher ratio between 1952 and 1958 was {smaller} than between 1951 and 1953.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1963 higher or lower than in 1967?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1963 was {lower} than in 1967.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1969, did the total Student-Teacher Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1968?
NC.A: The change in total student-teacher ratio between 1962 and 1969 was {larger} than between 1967 and 1968.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Polytechnic} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard School of Arts and Silverhaven Polytechnic first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard School of Arts and Silverhaven Polytechnic first exchanged leading positions in {1951}.
